Companies.name: Steeline
Companies.Description: Steeline is an arms manufacturing company specialized in heavy weaponry and munition.

Companies.name: Windchaser
Companies.Description: Windchaser is a company with a long standing tradition of making high quality hunting rifles and specialized ammunition.

Companies.Description: White Incorporate is a manufacturer of weaponized chemical products.

Companies.name: Precision Interstellar

Companies.name: Athena Artificial Intelligence
Companies.Description: Athena Artificial Intelligence specializes in providing AI services tailored to specific domains.

Companies.name: Shield inc.

Companies.name: Beehive

Companies.name: Falcon Aero

Companies.name: Starmap
